name: You Are The Plat_Form
description:
Story

The blue little monster are on their journey to get their tribe's sacred treasure. Help them to go through their tough journey!

- This is experimental platform game that requires player to act as platform itself. 

- Player uses mouse movement alone to interact with objects in games.

Sound Credit

The last sound effect in the ending animation is by Higgs01 (https://freesound.org/people/Higgs01/sounds/428156/)
